pr_title: JENKINS-54662 JCasC support for usage statistics

timeline.message: JENKINS-54662 JCasC support for usage statistics

timeline.author: timja

timeline.bodyText: It was introduced in 2011 or earlier, so it is not a big deal.  All reasonable  versions will be compatible 70c1065
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/core/src/main/java/jenkins/model/Jenkins.java b/core/src/main/java/jenkins/model/Jenkins.java
index cb972eb095..14ed4892d6 100644
--- a/core/src/main/java/jenkins/model/Jenkins.java
+++ b/core/src/main/java/jenkins/model/Jenkins.java

@@ -1378,6 +1378,7 @@ public class Jenkins extends AbstractCIBase implements DirectlyModifiableTopLeve
      *
      * @since TODO
      */
+    @CheckForNull
     public Boolean isNoUsageStatistics() {
         return noUsageStatistics;
     }

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 *
          
          
            
                 *
          
          
            
                 * @return {@code true} if usage statistics should be collected.
          
          
            
                 *                Defaults to {@code true} when {@link #noUsageStatistics} is not set.

timeline.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Oleg Nenashev <o.v.nenashev@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This method has existed forever. Why add @since TODO? Was trivial to tell before this PR was merged when this was added.
timeline.author: daniel-beck
